Politics.title: Trail hunting to be banned as part of new animal welfare strategy

Politics.title: 'Congress is in a coma.' Former lawmakers sound alarm on health of the House

Politics.title: Apple, Google tell workers on visas to avoid leaving the U.S. amid Trump immigration crackdown

Business.description: The new rate will come into effect at the beginning of January, Caritas Jersey says.

Business.title: The 'winners and losers' in Universal UK's plan to rival Disneyland Paris
